attributes.action: determine why it is often much cheaper to take the plane over the train and correct this to follow the Governments green policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I recently looked into a ticket from Newcastle to London via train and the prices were astronomical. The price to fly was literally over 2 times cheaper and I feel that this should not be the case when reducing carbon emissions is apparently very important to the current Government.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
